subject: Parenting
title: When Parents Disagree
description: A quick, practical guide to When Parents Disagree.

hook.text: Mom says yes. Dad says no. The child learns to play one against the other.

buildup.text: Parenting disagreements are normal, but visible conflict about rules creates confusion.

discovery.text: Children exposed to inter-parental conflict about discipline show higher anxiety and defiance.

twist.text: The disagreement itself isn't the problem â€” arguing in front of the child is.

climax.text: Couples who discuss differences privately and present a united front raise calmer kids.

quiz.question: What happens when parents argue about rules in front of children?
options: Children show higher anxiety and defiance
